title: Charge-Bound Warhammer
content:
und: This weapon deals an additional 1~6 Lightning damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Energy crackles in weird and wonderful patterns across your hand as you wield this bound weapon, as if your very veins were marbled like a cloud of blue-white lightning.

WarhammerVersatile

Charge-Bound Warhammer is one of the Warhammer Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Charge-Bound Warhammer is one of the many weapons that provides bonuses if its Bound or is a Pact Weapon, t
